info.title: CONSULTING  AGREEMENT
legal_concepts:
CONFIDENTIALITY  
The Consultant agrees to not disclose any confidential or proprietary information of 
the Company, including but not limited to business strategies, client lists, and 
technical data, to any third party during or after the te rm of this Agreement

(The Company and the Consultant are hereinafter collectively referred to as the 
‚ÄúParties ‚Äù and individually as a ‚Äú Party ‚Äù)

INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY  
All reports, documents, software, inventions, and any other work product created or 
developed by the Consultant in the course of performing the Services (the ‚ÄúWork 
Product‚Äù) shall be considered "work made for hire" and shall be the sole and 
exclusive property of the Company

RELATIONSHIP OF THE PARTIES  
It is expressly understood that the Consultant is an independent contractor and not 
an employee, agent, partner, or joint venturer  of the Company

CONSULTING  AGREEMENT  
This Consulting Agreement (the ‚Äú Agreement ‚Äù) is made and entered into as of this 
22nd day of August, 2025 (the ‚Äú Effective  Date ‚Äù)

Name: Priya Singh  
Title: D irector  
WITNESS  1: 
 
Name: Rohan Mehta  
Address: 15, Juhu Tara Road, Juhu, Mumbai 400049  
FOR  THE CONSULTANT:  
 
Name: Aarav Sharma  
WITNESS  2: 
 
Name: Sameer Gupta  
Address: B -304, Garden Estate, Goregaon, Mumbai 400063

Vikram Sharma, an individual residing at Flat 1201, 
Oberoi Springs, Link Road, Andheri (West), Mumbai, Maharashtra 400053, India, 
holding PAN: ABCDE1234F (hereinafter referred to as the ‚Äú Consultant ‚Äù)

, a private limited company incorporated under

Road, Bandra (West), Mumbai, Maharashtra 400050, India (hereinafter referred to 
as the ‚Äú Company ‚Äù),

legal_concepts:
IN WITNESS  WHEREOF , the Parties have caused this Agreement to be executed 
by their duly authorized representatives as of the Effective Date

The Company is engaged in the business of developing and marketing enterprise 
software solutions

Advising on the design and implementation of a scalable cloud infrastructure for 
the Company‚Äôs new flagship product, "ConnectSphere"

SCOPE OF SERVICES  
The Consultant shall provide the following services to the Company (the ‚ÄúServices‚Äù):  
a

The Parties agree that the courts of Mumbai, Maharashtra shall have exclusive 
jurisdiction over any disputes arising  in connection with this Agreement

TERM  
This Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and shall continue for a 
period of six (6) months, until February 21, 2026, unless terminated earlier in 
accordance with the provisions of this Agreement

In consideration for the Services, the Company shall pay the Consultant a fixed 
monthly fee of ‚Çπ2,50,000/ - (Rupees Two Lakh Fifty Thousand only)

Providing up to 10 hours of technical training per month to the Company's 
development team on best practices in cloud security

Without Cause: The Company may terminate this Agreement at any time, without 
cause, by providing the Consultant with thirty (30) days' prior  written notice

For Cause: Either Party may terminate this Agreement immediately upon written 
notice if the other Party commits a material breach of any provision of t his 
Agreement and fails to cure such breach within fourteen (14) days of receiving 
written notice of the breach

The fees mentioned above are exclusive of any applicable Goods and Services 
Tax (GST), which shall be charged by the Consultant in the invoice as per the 
prevailing r ates

The Compan y wishes to engage the Consultant to provide certain expert services, 
and the Consultant is willing to provide such services on the terms and conditions set 
forth in this Agreement

CONFIDENTIALITY  
The Consultant agrees to not disclose any confidential or proprietary information of 
the Company, including but not limited to business strategies, client lists, and 
technical data, to any third party during or after the te rm of this Agreement

(The Company and the Consultant are hereinafter collectively referred to as the 
‚ÄúParties ‚Äù and individually as a ‚Äú Party ‚Äù)

INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY  
All reports, documents, software, inventions, and any other work product created or 
developed by the Consultant in the course of performing the Services (the ‚ÄúWork 
Product‚Äù) shall be considered "work made for hire" and shall be the sole and 
exclusive property of the Company

RELATIONSHIP OF THE PARTIES  
It is expressly understood that the Consultant is an independent contractor and not 
an employee, agent, partner, or joint venturer  of the Company

CONSULTING  AGREEMENT  
This Consulting Agreement (the ‚Äú Agreement ‚Äù) is made and entered into as of this 
22nd day of August, 2025 (the ‚Äú Effective  Date ‚Äù)
